attributes.additional_details: I will like to start a petition asking the government to make us available a secure online voting system as soon as possible so that as many of us as possible can exercise our rights so as the country can get to a larger sample and, therefore, true reflection of people's will.
attributes.background: In the recently concluded EU referendum, only 72% citizens were able to participate. It is possible that many of the remaining, had a desire to vote but could not do so due to travelling, sickness, work etc.
